players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Diana: "Alice was killed last night, so Charlie must be the mafia. Vote him out."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be mafia. He's the only suspect. Please vote him out."
You: "As the detective, I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be mafia. He's the only suspect. Vote him out before he can kill again."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
